Html:
Hi,

I've searched the web and I found a code that grabs the schedule from NHL.com, but this is for c# 3.0, and I am at the moment on c# 2.0. And since I am not that fluent with c# I was wondering if anyone could help out guiding me on how to get the schedule from NHL.com by using Html Agility Pack.
Best regards,
Trond
